When you ask a woman about the most memorable days of her life, she will certainly mention her wedding day in a list of others. Of course, she remembers the first time she met her future husband on the wonderful May day, but the day that happened in a year, the wedding one, will always stay apart in her reminiscences along with the birth of her children and the time she fell in love with their father.

She remembers the sunny weather, the murmuring breakers, the love in his eyes, her elated mood, happiness, the beautiful streaming dress, the modest suit of the ever loved person close to her. There are so many such stories, so different at each particular case, but always inspiring and evoking smiles, pleasant emotions and lighting the eyes.
